name: WizRide
tag_list: taxi, limo, carpool, ride, share, town, car, airport, shuttle, cab, minicab, cheap, suv, booking, luxury, fare, bus, app
description: a ride app that gives you options.
overview:
WizRide is the easiest and most reliable way to request a ride. WizRide gives you the exact price, distance and duration of your trip prior to booking the ride. The app lets your driver know precisely when and where to pick you up. When you request a ride using our app we’ll send you your drivers cell phone number and your ride details in an SMS message. To book a ride using the WizRide app you only need a credit card and a destination. No cash is paid to the driver. Our app provides you various ride options to suit your budget.

(We do not process your credit card until you have completed your ride.)

We offer the following ride categories:

-Taxi -Social RideShare -Black Car & Luxury SUV -Airport Shuttle Transit -Paratransit

Our website lists the cities and airports we currently offer service to and from. Please call our 1888# to contact a friendly representative.
